transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Himanshu baat kar rahe hain? Hello?
Customer: Haan ji bol raha hu.
Executive: Himanshu sir good morning, mai Reshu baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se, your relationship manager.
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Ji sir, sir actually kal aapka ek discussion hua tha aapke account manager se Anurag se na aur unki call ke baad aapko ek feedback receive hua tha, aapne usme not satisfied kuch share kiya hai sir.
Executive: To mujhe just wohi jaanna tha sir ki kaha pe problem face kar rahe hain sir aap? Account manager se kuch issue aa raha hai ya kuch service related issue face kar rahe ho aap?
Customer: Service related.
Executive: Uh, sir jaise jaan sakti hu mai ki kya issue aa raha hai services me aapko?
Customer: Service matlab jo humne daal rakhi hai usko proper visibility nahi aa rahi hai kya hai?
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Uh, sir aap ye keh rahe ho ki jo aapke product wagera dale hue hain unme aapko matlab proper visibility wagera ya response wagera nahi mil pa raha hai, right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai, sir jaise ki mai check kar pa rahi hu jaise duct air cooler, hai na? Ye aapka main product hai ya industrial air cooler, aapka ye main products hain aapke, hai na?
Executive: Ye bhi, uh, yahi aapko matlab majorly aap inme deal kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ya aroma diffuser ho gaye, commercial kitchen chimneys ho gayi, ye aapke products hain.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To, uh, sir isme agar mai check kar rahi hu buyleads wagera to available hai but kaafi samay se jaise agar mai pichle 30 days ki baat karti hu sir aapne sirf do hi din service ko use kiya hai.
Executive: To matlab kaha pe issue tha sir?
Customer: Issue? Issue to wohi aa raha hai jo aapko bata raha hu kuch leads mujhe dikhengi tabhi mai dekh paunga.
Executive: Nahi sir sahi baat hai, jaise aap all over India deal karte ho sir ya phir aap matlab local area target kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Local area target aap.
Executive: Local area, kyuki jaise ki mai check kar pa rahi hu aapki jo preference hai sir woh local hai, Saharanpur aur Roorkee majorly aapne do hi location ki buylead wagera ko aap consume karte ho.
Customer: Saharanpur, Roorkee, Haridwar, Dehradun.
Executive: Mai agar sir mai nearest state me dekhti hu, Delhi wagera me kya deal karenge aap?
Customer: Haan ji?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: To, uh, sir agar mai Delhi ki baat kar rahi hu to jaise mini scent aroma diffuser ki aapko New Delhi se ek inquiry abhi aayi hai, phir ek aapko aroma diffuser ki home car ke liye 1000 pieces ki inquiry New Delhi se aayi hai.
Customer: Woh ye to nahi karte, car wala nahi karte na hum, commercial wagera.
Executive: Achha commercial wala aap karte hain sir.
Executive: Aur jaise sir, uh, ye apna AC aluminium grill wagera, ye bhi apna product hai kya?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Isse bhi ek inquiry 12 ghante pehle business use ki aayi hui hai, industrial hi hai sir, ye aapne check kari hogi isme matlab customer purana do saal purana customer hai already IndiaMART pe multiple inquiries daal chuka hai. To ye aap check kar sakte ho sir, ye aapko 12 ghante pehle hai, ek portable container traffic ki inquiry hai Punjab se sir, FRP me material hai business use ke liye hai, to kya ye apne aap ko matlab sahi inquiry hai sir ye?
Customer: Kaunsi wali?
Executive: Uh, portable container traffic sir, FRP material hai business use likha hua hai.
Customer: Nahi, nahi.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Ye bhi hai. To sir aap na dekho do cheezein kijiye sir aap, agar aap buylead pe jaate ho na, buylead pe jaake sabse pehle sir aap fixing date pe jaaiye aur nearest state ka filter laga lijiye, jab aap nearest state ka filter laga ke jo buylead aapko samne dikh rahi hai na sir, to jo kaam ki lead hai sir aap usko consume kijiye aur jo kaam ki nahi hai na sir aap usko not interested mark kar dijiye, matlab usse correct reasons jo bhi abhi aapne mujhe bataya ki aapko matlab location ka problem hai ya aapko product related problem hai, aap us inquiry ko agar not relevant mark kar doge sir to woh hamara backend se check hoti hai ye cheezein aur usko phir correct bhi kiya ja sakta hai sir, plus me jo direct inquiry sir aapko aa rahi hai aap unko agar login karke wahin se call back and reply karoge na sir to usse bhi na sir aap matlab thoda aapki activity dikhegi, abhi kya dikh raha hai na sir dekho aapka reason genuine hai, aap keh rahe ho ki mere ko local me utni inquiry nahi dikh rahi hai ya phir right inquiry nahi dikh rahi hai jiski wajah se mai service ko use nahi kar raha.
Executive: Lekin aaj ke time me na sir hamari jo service hai woh AI based hai aur AI aapka buying behaviour capture karta hai. For an example aap kisi particular product ki inquiry ko search kar rahe ho sir, jaise sir YouTube wagera me hota hai na sir aap koi content search karte ho aapko usi tarike ka content zyada dikhta hai, aise hi IndiaMART pe hai sir agar aap search box me apni kisi product ki inquiry ko search karoge ya consume karoge aapko us tarike ki inquiries zyada dikhengi to aapko sirf right inquiry ko consume karna hai sir aur jo not matlab relevant hai usko aap matlab NI mark kar dijiye with the correct reason to woh cheezein sahi ho jaayengi sir aapki aur plus me sir jaise kuch product hai jaise mai agar baat karti hu na industrial air cooler to sir ye to kaafi wide category hai matlab isme bahut kuch aa jaata hai to aap sabhi tarike ke industrial air cooler me deal karte hain sir?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Okay, to ye wali category sahi hai, baaki isme sir kuch product aise bhi hain jo aapne matlab hataya hua hai jaise industrial fan hai sir ye aapne out of stock mark kara hai, industrial selling fan hai ye bhi aapne out of stock mark kara hai, to kya inme deal nahi kar rahe ho?
Customer: Nahi, ye nahi kiya maine to.
Executive: Aur pre fabricated duct, ye sir?
Customer: Nahi, maine nahi kiya.
Executive: Sir ye aapke kuch product out of stock mark hue hue hain jaise, uh, sir ye aa raha hai fafa hai ya phir aapka industrial air duct ho gaya, party tent rental, ye aapka, uh, out of stock mark hua hua hai, to ye, ye wale product ko mai matlab in kar du sir aapke?
Customer: Saare in kar do.
Executive: Theek hai, mai inko in kar deti hu sir. Plus me sir aapse request ye rahega ki aap na thoda sa portal ko use karna start kijiye sir, matlab aap pichle 30 days me aapne sirf services ko do din use kiya hai and apart that sir aapki buyer ki call bhi miss ho jaati hai, matlab agar aap dekhoge ki is mahine bhi sir paanch buyer call aapke miss hui hai, pichle mahine agar aap dekhenge sir aapki aath buyer ki call miss hui thi, aapko 19 call aayi thi sir customer ke to woh aapki saari miss ho ja rahi hain sir.
Executive: To aap iska thoda sa dhyaan rakhiye sir buyer ki call wagera ka aur, uh, aap catalog me agar kuch changes wagera hai sir aapke to aap Google meeting join kar sakte hain sir mai aapke changes wagera kar deti hu, aap jo jo bolenge woh mai changes kar deti hu sir taaki aapko right inquiries wagera ka location ho jaaye, to kya hum video meeting pe connect kar sakte hain sir, Google meeting pe?
Customer: Theek hai, kar sakte hain but abhi to thoda sa mai busy hu.
Executive: Theek kab connect ho sakta hai sir?
Customer: Dekhte hain.
Executive: Hello sir phir kab connect ho sakte hain?
Executive: Theek hai, baaki sir ye jo ek hamare paas account manager se related, uh, feedback raise hua tha ki sir, uh, matlab not interest, no, uh, aapne not satisfied likha tha, to kya ye mai close kar sakti hu sir?
Customer: Hmm, abhi nahi, pehle woh karao changes.
Executive: To changes ke liye aap mujhe bataiye sir aap kitne baje tak mai video meeting ka link karu mai aapko?
Customer: Mai khud hi call karta hu aapko phir okay.
Executive: Theek hai, isi number pe aap please call kar lijiyega, theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek.
Executive: Okay, thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting proper visibility.

- Customer is not using the service regularly.

- Buyer calls are being missed.

- Some products are marked as out of stock.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use buyleads effectively.

- Executive offered to help with catalog changes.

- Executive will mark in the out of stock products.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back for video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, visibility, catalog, out of stock, inquiries
